faq.question: Do recipients need an account to view summaries?
faq.answer: No! Public links work for anyone without requiring sign-up or login. They just click and view instantly.

faq.question: Can I password-protect shared links?
faq.answer: Yes! Set a password when creating the share link. Recipients will need to enter the password to view the summary.

faq.question: Can I revoke access to shared summaries?
faq.answer: Absolutely. Revoke any shared link anytime from your sharing dashboard. The link stops working immediately.

faq.question: How long do share links last?
faq.answer: By default, links don't expire. You can optionally set expiration dates (1 day, 1 week, 1 month, custom) for time-sensitive shares.

faq.question: Can I track who viewed my summaries?
faq.answer: Pro and Team plans include view analytics showing who viewed your summaries, when, and how long they spent viewing.

faq.question: Can shared recipients download the summary?
faq.answer: You control this! Choose whether recipients can view only, or also download/export the summary.

faq.question: Is sharing secure?
faq.answer: Yes! All share links use encryption, and you control access with passwords, expiration, and revocation. Your original PDFs are never shared unless you choose to.
